description: The Grim Reapers were the elite fencers that appeared in "Earth Defense Force 5." They were a dependable force that often aided (and at times were aided by) the protagonist. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Fencer that uses the Grim Reaper's colors. He of course comes equipped with a Blasthole Spear for his weapon. Now, charge into the enemy as if staring death straight in the eyes.
name: Fencer (EDF5), Grim Reaper Colors & Special Gear
